hero.title: Transforming Ideas Into
hero.description: I craft elegant, high-performance digital solutions that drive growth and exceed expectations. From sleek websites to intelligent automation systems—I build what you envision.

about.subtitle: About Me
about.title: Who I
about.intro: Hi! I'm Fatima Zahra Sabbar, a passionate Full Stack Developer and IT Solutions Specialist dedicated to transforming complex challenges into elegant, efficient digital solutions.
about.description: With over 3 years of hands-on experience, I specialize in creating modern, secure, and scalable web applications that drive real business value. My expertise spans from crafting pixel-perfect user interfaces to architecting robust backend systems and implementing intelligent automation workflows. I'm not just about writing code—I'm about delivering solutions that make a tangible impact on your business growth and efficiency.

fullstack.title: Full Stack Development
fullstack.description: I build end-to-end web solutions using cutting-edge technologies like React, Next.js, and Node.js to create fast, scalable applications.

ai.title: AI & Automation
ai.description: I leverage AI and custom automation to streamline workflows, eliminate repetitive tasks, and boost productivity dramatically.

wordpress.title: WordPress & CMS
wordpress.description: I create beautiful, user-friendly WordPress sites with custom themes and plugins that perfectly match your brand identity.

it.title: IT Consulting
it.description: I provide expert IT consultation and implement secure, scalable infrastructure solutions tailored to your business needs.

webdev.title: Website & Web App Development
webdev.description: Creating responsive, high-performance websites and applications tailored to your personal or business needs.

automation.title: IT & Automation Solutions
automation.description: Building custom scripts and AI-powered workflows to automate repetitive tasks and boost your efficiency.

uiux.title: UI/UX Design
uiux.description: Designing intuitive, user-friendly interfaces with a clean and modern aesthetic for your digital projects.

mobile.title: Mobile App Development
mobile.description: Building cross-platform mobile applications that provide seamless user experiences on iOS and Android.

seo.title: SEO & Digital Marketing
seo.description: Optimizing your online presence to drive traffic, improve rankings, and grow your business reach.

cloud.title: Cloud Solutions
cloud.description: Deploying and managing secure, scalable cloud infrastructure to support your growing applications.

whyChooseMe.subtitle: My Value Proposition
whyChooseMe.title: Why Work
whyChooseMe.description: I don't just deliver code—I deliver results. When you work with me, you get a dedicated partner who's genuinely invested in your success and committed to bringing your digital vision to life.

innovative.title: Innovative Thinking
innovative.description: I approach every project with fresh perspectives and creative problem-solving, turning your vision into reality with cutting-edge solutions that stand out.

reliable.title: Reliable & On-Time
reliable.description: Your time is valuable. I pride myself on delivering exceptional quality within agreed deadlines, keeping you informed every step of the way.

excellence.title: Excellence-Driven
excellence.description: I'm committed to delivering nothing less than exceptional. Using the latest technologies and best practices, I build robust, scalable, and maintainable solutions.

partnership.title: Ongoing Partnership
partnership.description: My relationship with clients doesn't end at launch. I provide continuous support and maintenance to ensure your project thrives long-term.
